description: Write a function to remove uppercase substrings from a given string by using regex.
input_format: A single line containing the input string.
output_format: A single line containing the resulting string after removing all uppercase substrings.
prompt:
; Write a function to remove uppercase substrings from a given string by using regex.
; Input format: A single line containing the input string.
; Output format: A single line containing the resulting string after removing all uppercase substrings.

#lang racket
completions:
(define (remove-uppercase-substrings str)
  (regexp-replace #rx"[A-Z]+" str ""))

(remove-uppercase-substrings "Hello World! This is a Test.")

(define (remove-uppercase-substrings input-string)
  (regexp-replace #rx"[A-Z]+" input-string ""))

;; Sample Input-Output Pairs
;; (remove-uppercase-substrings "Hello World") => "ello orld"
;; (remove-uppercase-substrings "Racket Programming") => "acket rogramming"
;; (remove-uppercase-substrings "123 ABC abc") => "123 ABC abc"
